chapter.text: With each crash, the equipment around you shifts and shakes. ^1500Then it begins to bend in on you. ^1500You find the space you sit begin to shrink. ^1500Bang. ^1500The way you came gets smaller as the equipment caves in. ^1500Bang. ^1500You feel a sharp pain in your leg. ^1500You look down and see your leg caught under a basketball hoop. ^1500Bang. ^1500You try to pull yourself out. ^1500Youâ€™re stuck. ^1500Bang. ^1500You feel a sharp pain through your chest. ^1500Your vision goes dark.
